nodes.bodyText:
Can we carry the capability structures over and only convert to strings in the BMP forwarder?
This will give us more flexibility to do things with them later.
Not that it currently is required to implement right now, but do we have a clue about what this value could be?
I don't think we should filter the parameters, as capabilities are parameters, too. An we should keep the link to the rfc for further reference to there parameter types, if there are any.
